channel.title: Wing Gundam Zero EW on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Wing Gundam Zero EW on John Cosio

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description:
So after looking around on how to paint and what best way to do this I ended up coloring and working on this using my computer. This is the previous SD we built – Wing Gundam EW Before editing using GIMP Before editing After editing Cleaned up some nubs, changes colors and a lot more easier done.
Pros of using computer Cheaper I didn’t have to buy any paint Faster, it is seen asap.

item.title: Build Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description: KIT: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW Series: Gundam Wing We have another SD from Gundam Wing. The Gundam of Heero Yuy. It’s really cool but I like the Deathscythe more, personal preference I guess. I wanted to start painting but currently still looking and learning from tutorials online. I’m not sure if this EW batch of SD have all of the EW Gundams but it would be great to collect all.
